member.name: T:Sandbox.Events.EarlyAttribute
member.summary: Only valid on implementations. Forces this event handler to be invoked before any handlers not marked as early, except if more specific constraints are given (i.e., , ).

member.name: T:Sandbox.Events.LateAttribute
member.summary: Only valid on implementations. Forces this event handler to be invoked after any handlers not marked as late, except if more specific constraints are given (i.e., , ).

member.name: T:Sandbox.Events.BeforeAttribute`1
member.summary: Only valid on implementations. Forces this event handler to be invoked before any handlers in the specified type.

member.name: T:Sandbox.Events.AfterAttribute`1
member.summary: Only valid on implementations. Forces this event handler to be invoked after any handlers in the specified type.

member.name: T:Sandbox.Events.SortingHelper
member.summary: Generate an ordering based on a set of first-most and last-most items, and individual constraints between pairs of items. All first-most items will be ordered before all last-most items, and any other items will be put in the middle unless forced to be elsewhere by a constraint.
